message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for it, seeing as it's a one-of-a-kind item.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for this unique item. I'm counteroffering at $120. What do you think?
